projects.title:
CBL
(CBOR, Bitmap, List)
projects.description: Created a Python library to facilitate efficient encoding and decoding of JSON-LD data using our novel compression algorithm called CBL

projects.title: Volumetric Weight Estimation
projects.description: Implemented a system for accurate volumetric weight estimation using advanced computer vision techniques

projects.title: SteelEye - Ladle Tracking System
projects.description: Developed an end-to-end Ladle Tracking System that automates ladle number detection in steel plants using a fine-tuned YOLOv8 model
